mapper.select: select u.id id, u.name name, s.duringScore score from xcs_cf_points.student u join xcs_cf_points.score s on u.id = s.uid where s.cid = (select id from xcs_cf_points.contests c where c.name = #{name}) and s.duringScore > 0

select u.id id, u.name name, s.afterScore score from xcs_cf_points.student u join xcs_cf_points.score s on u.id = s.uid where s.cid = (select id from xcs_cf_points.contests c where c.name = #{name}) and s.afterScore > 0
